description: Basic grey scale games were guessing and clicking are the main mechanisms. I understand that it took work to achieve this but no one is going to play it. That is why my review is the only one.

I must admit I grabbed this as it was the lowest rated game in the store. I didn't actually realise that just grabbing 'Unruly' would download the entire collection!

These are perfect ports (of the ones I've tried so far) of the original Windows versions - simple, minimal presentation puzzle/logic games. I've been running these on Windows for years - great for killing a couple of minutes while waiting for a compile/download/file copy to finish!
summary: Great simple logic games. Note - it's the full collection!
